וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer replied דָּוִ֜ד <WH1732> dā·wiḏ David לַאֲחִימֶ֣לֶךְ <WH288> la·’ă·ḥî·me·leḵ - הַכֹּהֵ֗ן <WH3548> hak·kō·hên -. הַמֶּלֶךְ֮ <WH4428> ham·me·leḵ “ The king צִוַּ֣נִי <WH6680> ṣiw·wa·nî has given me דָבָר֒ <WH1697> ḏā·ḇār a mission, ” וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer “ He told אֵלַ֗י <WH413> ’ê·lay me אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> ’îš vvv אַל־ <WH408> ’al- no one יֵ֧דַע <WH3045> yê·ḏa‘ is to know מְא֛וּמָה <WH3972> mə·’ū·māh - אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- about הַדָּבָ֛ר <WH1697> had·dā·ḇār the mission אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> ’ă·šer- - אָנֹכִ֥י <WH595> ’ā·nō·ḵî - שֹׁלֵֽחֲךָ֖ <WH7971> šō·lê·ḥă·ḵā - וַאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> wa·’ă·šer or צִוִּיתִ֑ךָ <WH6680> ṣiw·wî·ṯi·ḵā charge. וְאֶת־ <WH853> wə·’eṯ- And הַנְּעָרִ֣ים <WH5288> han·nə·‘ā·rîm [my] young men יוֹדַ֔עְתִּי <WH3045> yō·w·ḏa‘·tî I have directed אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- to meet me מְק֥וֹם <WH4725> mə·qō·wm at a certain place פְּלֹנִ֖י <WH6423> pə·lō·nî ... אַלְמוֹנִֽי׃ <WH492> ’al·mō·w·nî ....

וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> wə·‘at·tāh Now then, מַה־ <WH4100> mah- what יֵּ֧שׁ <WH3426> yêš do you have תַּֽחַת־ <WH8478> ta·ḥaṯ- on יָדְךָ֛ <WH3027> yā·ḏə·ḵā hand? חֲמִשָּׁה־ <WH2568> ḥă·miš·šāh- five [loaves of] לֶ֖חֶם <WH3899> le·ḥem bread, תְּנָ֣ה <WH5414> tə·nāh Give [me] בְיָדִ֑י <WH3027> ḇə·yā·ḏî ... א֖וֹ <WH176> ’ōw or הַנִּמְצָֽא׃ <WH4672> han·nim·ṣā whatever can be found. ”

וַיַּ֨עַן <WH6030> way·ya·‘an replied הַכֹּהֵ֤ן <WH3548> hak·kō·hên the priest אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - דָּוִד֙ <WH1732> dā·wiḏ - וַיֹּ֔אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer -, אֵֽין־ <WH369> ’ên- “ [There is] no לֶ֥חֶם <WH3899> le·ḥem bread חֹ֖ל <WH2455> ḥōl common אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> ta·ḥaṯ on יָדִ֑י <WH3027> yā·ḏî hand, ” כִּֽי־ <WH3588> kî- “ אִם־ <WH518> ’im- but לֶ֤חֶם <WH3899> le·ḥem bread — קֹ֙דֶשׁ֙ <WH6944> qō·ḏeš consecrated יֵ֔שׁ <WH3426> yêš there is some אִם־ <WH518> ’im- provided that נִשְׁמְר֥וּ <WH8104> niš·mə·rū have kept themselves הַנְּעָרִ֖ים <WH5288> han·nə·‘ā·rîm the young men אַ֥ךְ <WH389> ’aḵ - מֵאִשָּֽׁה׃פ <WH802> mê·’iš·šāh from women. ”

וַיִּתֶּן־ <WH5414> way·yit·ten- gave ל֥וֹ Prep│3ms ( lōw) him הַכֹּהֵ֖ן 3548 Art│N-ms ( hak·kō·hên) So the priest קֹ֑דֶשׁ 6944 N-ms ( qō·ḏeš) the consecrated [bread], כִּי֩ 3588 Conj ( kî) since לֹא־ 3808 Adv-NegPrt ( lō-) no הָ֨יָה 1961 V-Qal-Perf-3ms ( hā·yāh) there was שָׁ֜ם 8033 Adv ( šām) there לֶ֗חֶם 3899 N-ms ( le·ḥem) bread כִּֽי־ 3588 Conj ( kî-) אִם־ 518 Conj ( ’im-) but לֶ֤חֶם 3899 N-msc ( le·ḥem) the Bread הַפָּנִים֙ 6440 Art│N-mp ( hap·pā·nîm) of the Presence, הַמּֽוּסָרִים֙ 5493 Art│V-Hofal-Prtcpl-mp ( ham·mū·sā·rîm) which had been removed מִלִּפְנֵ֣י 6440 Prep-m, Prep-l│N-cpc ( mil·lip̄·nê) from before יְהוָ֔ה 3068 N-proper-ms ( Yah·weh) the LORD לָשׂוּם֙ 7760 Prep-l│V-Qal-Inf ( lā·śūm) and replaced with לֶ֣חֶם 3899 N-msc ( le·ḥem) bread חֹ֔ם 2527 N-ms ( ḥōm) hot בְּי֖וֹם 3117 Prep-b│N-msc ( bə·yō·wm) on the day הִלָּקְחֽוֹ׃ 3947 V-Nifal-Inf│3ms ( hil·lā·qə·ḥōw) it was taken away.

וְשָׁ֡ם <WH8033> wə·šām was there אִישׁ֩ <WH376> ’îš Now one מֵעַבְדֵ֨י <WH5650> mê·‘aḇ·ḏê servants שָׁא֜וּל <WH7586> šā·’ūl of Saul’s בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> bay·yō·wm day, הַה֗וּא <WH1931> ha·hū that נֶעְצָר֙ <WH6113> ne‘·ṣār detained לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> lip̄·nê before יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD. וּשְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> ū·šə·mōw And his name [was] דֹּאֵ֣ג <WH1673> dō·’êḡ Doeg הָאֲדֹמִ֑י <WH130> hā·’ă·ḏō·mî the Edomite, אַבִּ֥יר <WH47> ’ab·bîr the chief הָרֹעִ֖ים <WH7462> hā·rō·‘îm shepherd אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> ’ă·šer for לְשָׁאֽוּל׃ <WH7586> lə·šā·’ūl Saul.

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer asked ( David Flees to Gath) ( 230 34:1-22) ;  230 56:1-13 דָּוִד֙ 1732 N-proper-ms ( dā·wiḏ) Then David לַאֲחִימֶ֔לֶךְ 288 Prep-l│N-proper-ms ( la·’ă·ḥî·me·leḵ) Ahimelech, וְאִ֛ין 371 Conj-w│Adv ( wə·’în) not יֶשׁ־ 3426 Adv ( yeš-) “ Is there פֹּ֥ה 6311 Adv ( pōh) here? תַֽחַת־ 8478 Prep ( ṯa·ḥaṯ-) on יָדְךָ֖ 3027 N-fsc│2ms ( yā·ḏə·ḵā) hand חֲנִ֣ית 2595 N-fs ( ḥă·nîṯ) a spear אוֹ־ 176 Conj ( ’ōw-) or חָ֑רֶב 2719 N-fs ( ḥā·reḇ) sword כִּ֣י 3588 Conj ( kî) For גַם־ 1571 Conj ( ḡam-) - חַרְבִּ֤י 2719 N-fsc│1cs ( ḥar·bî) my sword וְגַם־ 1571 Punc ( wə·ḡam-) nor כֵּלַי֙ 3627 N-mpc│1cs ( kê·lay) my weapons לֹֽא־ 3808 Adv-NegPrt ( lō-) neither לָקַ֣חְתִּי 3947 V-Qal-Perf-1cs ( lā·qaḥ·tî) I have brought בְיָדִ֔י 3027 Prep-b│N-fsc│1cs ( ḇə·yā·ḏî) with me, כִּֽי־ 3588 Conj ( kî-) because הָיָ֥ה 1961 V-Qal-Perf-3ms ( hā·yāh) was דְבַר־ 1697 N-msc ( ḏə·ḇar-) business הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ 4428 Art│N-ms ( ham·me·leḵ) the king’s נָחֽוּץ׃ס 5169 V-Qal-QalPassPrtcpl-ms ( nā·ḥūṣ) urgent. ”
